title: The Enemy's Baby
description: Rammstein Skinner is one of the most respected mobsters in the mafia but little does he know I’ve had a crush on him for the longest time. My feelings don’t seem to be mutual and he confuses me by going hot and cold.Then I find out he has secrets. The man who once was held in the highest regard by the mob is now its biggest enemy.And as if things couldn't get any worse...I’m carrying the enemy’s baby.
author: Ever Lilac
